input.sentences: the groom was waiting for his bride to come .
the music played as she entered .
he looked down the aisle nervous yet excited .
they smiled at each other as they recited their vows .
output.sentences: On the day of the wedding, the groom stood waiting for his bride.
The music started playing and the bride made her entrance.
The groom was nervous, but also excited, as he looked down the aisle.
The bride looked beautiful, and the groom couldn't stop smiling at the sight of her.
The happy couple smiled brightly and recited their vows, declaring their love for each other.
